$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
Default Configuration
$(PRODUCT_MODULE_NAME).SceneDelegate
HealthAI 2030 needs access to your health data to provide personalized insights and recommendations for your wellness journey.
HealthAI 2030 needs to write health data to track your progress and sync with your health profile.
HealthAI 2030 uses your camera for AR health visualizations and biometric analysis to enhance your health monitoring experience.
HealthAI 2030 uses your microphone for voice commands and audio-based health assessments to provide hands-free interaction.
HealthAI 2030 uses your location to provide location-based health insights and environmental health data analysis.
HealthAI 2030 uses your location in the background to provide continuous environmental health monitoring and location-based wellness recommendations.
HealthAI 2030 uses motion data to track your physical activity and provide personalized fitness recommendations.
HealthAI 2030 uses Face ID to securely access your health data and provide personalized health insights.
HealthAI 2030 uses your local network to connect with smart home devices for environmental health monitoring.
HealthAI 2030 uses Bluetooth to connect with health devices and wearables for comprehensive health monitoring.
HealthAI 2030 uses Bluetooth to connect with health devices and wearables for comprehensive health monitoring.
HealthAI 2030 uses your photo library to analyze food intake and provide nutritional insights for your health journey.
HealthAI 2030 uses Siri to provide voice-activated health commands and quick access to your health insights.
